title: 'Defective or duplicate?'
body: 'I had ordered this about 6-7 months ago and what I received was a decent quality product. This time when I ordered
column5: the delivered product had a defective pocket. Obviously I ordered a replacement and the replacement product was MUCH SHORTER than the one I had ordered for the first time (6-7 months back). What is going on with the quality control? Is it even a genuine product that customers are getting nowadays?'
